title: Sigrid - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Arrogant Characters   Beautiful Female Lead   Betrayal   Character Growth   Corruption   Economics   Enemies Become Allies   European Ambience   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Friendship   Hard-Working Protagonist   Honest Protagonist   Kidnappings   Knights   Lack of Common Sense   Magic   Misunderstandings   Monsters   Nobles   Past Trauma   Personality Changes   Poor to Rich   R-15   Royalty   Second Chance   S*xual Abuse   Stubborn Protagonist   Sword And Magic   Sword Wielder   Time Travel   Torture   Wealthy Characters
author: Siya   시야
description:
Her whole life, Sigrid lived as an imperial knight, a loyal servant, and a faithful subject. However, her loyalty was rewarded with disgrace, dishonor, false accusation, and a guillotine.

“If I came back,” she vowed, '... I’m not going to live a life like that again!'

Executed at the guillotine for assassinating the Crown Prince, Sigrid somehow opened her eyes again... and found herself five years before the day of her execution.

Once upon a time, Sigrid had lived an immaculate and principled life. However, now that she was given a second chance, she knew better.>
